text: Novotroitskaya () is a rural locality (a village) in Krivle-Ilyushkinsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 38 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 23 km from Yermolayevo, 1 km from Krivle-Ilyushkino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Novotroitskaya, Republic of Bashkortostan
